title: Cgo crash on windows.
body:
by **AllenGnr**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Make and install "w32" package in attached package.
2. Make and install "gform" package in attached package.
3. Make and run "gui.go".
4. Drag the windows right border and move very quickly.

What is the expected output?
The application runs normally.

What do you see instead?
Crash occurred with below error message.
